With regards to earlier mention of "We're an American Band", the percussion intro to that song is just *chef's kiss*. What to attribute to drummer/vocalist Don Brewer and what to producer Todd Rundgren, don't know. But Todd was a decent drummer, despite Andy Partridge's gripes.
